no_apps: You don't have access to any applications yet.

login.title: Sign in to continue
login.subtitle: Access your applications portal
login.email_invalid: Please enter a valid email address
login.forgot_password_email_required: Please fill in the email first
login.forgot_password_sent: If an account exists with this email, a new password has been sent.
login.slogan_description: SaaS platform for aesthetic clinics. Centralize operations, automate processes, and scale your business.
login.email_not_registered: Email not registered. Learn more at
login.subscription_cancelled: Your subscription has been cancelled. Contact us:
login.integration_title: Want to connect LivoCare to your systems?
login.integration_description: We develop custom integrations and automations for your operation. Built-in API + expert team.
login.instagram_description: Stay updated with news, tips, and exclusive content about automation and technology for clinics.
login.session_invalidated: Your session was ended because you signed in on another device. Please sign in again.

home.contact_admin: Contact your administrator to get access to applications.
home.view_apps_team_access: View your applications and team members access
home.no_apps_description: No applications are currently available for your organization.

branding.title: Branding
branding.subtitle: Customize your organization's visual identity and branding
branding.reset_confirm: Are you sure you want to reset branding to defaults?
branding.contact_info_description: This information will be displayed in email footers and public quote pages.
branding.upload_modal_description: Select a logo image to represent your organization
branding.upload_modal_drag_drop: Drag and drop an image file, or click to browse
branding.upload_modal_please_wait: Please wait while we upload your image
branding.upload_modal_saved: Your logo has been saved and will be reflected across your organization.
branding.upload_modal_not_image: Selected file is not an image

entitlements.title: Entitlements
entitlements.no_team_members: No team members have access to this application yet.
entitlements.no_team_members_description: No team members have access to this application yet.

summary.title: Applications Summary
summary.description: Overview of all applications available for your organization

communication.title: Email & Communication
communication.subtitle: Configure SMTP and other communication channels
communication.from_name_hint: Name that will appear as sender (e.g., LivoCare.ai)
communication.from_email_hint: Email address that will appear as sender
communication.cc_emails_placeholder: Type an email and press Enter
communication.cc_emails_hint: These addresses will receive a copy of all emails sent

configurations.transcription_description: Manage your transcription usage and quota settings

transcription_usage.title: Transcription Usage
transcription_usage.subtitle: Track your transcription minutes and manage your monthly quota
transcription_usage.error_loading: Failed to load transcription usage data
transcription_usage.overage_warning: You have exceeded your monthly quota by {{overage}}
transcription_usage.language_settings_description: Choose the default language for processing your audio transcriptions.
transcription_usage.language_description: Select the default language that will be used to process your audio transcriptions. You can choose Portuguese (Brazil) or English (US).
transcription_usage.overage_description: If enabled, you can continue transcribing beyond your monthly limit. Additional charges may apply.
transcription_usage.detailed_usage_subtitle: View individual transcriptions with duration and cost
transcription_usage.quota_warning_message: You have used {{used}} of {{limit}} minutes ({{percent}}%). Consider managing your usage or increasing your limit.
transcription_usage.quota_exceeded_message: You have reached your monthly limit of {{limit}} minutes. Cannot start new transcription until next month. Contact your account manager to increase your limit.
transcription_usage.manage_subscription_description: Update your plan, payment method, or view invoices

trial_expired.title: Your trial period has ended
trial_expired.message: To continue using transcription features, choose a plan that fits your needs.

plans.title: Choose your plan
plans.subtitle: Select the ideal plan for your transcription needs
plans.questions_description: Our team is ready to help you choose the best plan.

header.logout_confirm_description: Are you sure you want to sign out?

bug_report.title: Report Bug
bug_report.subject: Subject
bug_report.description_placeholder: Describe the bug in detail. Include steps to reproduce, expected behavior, and what actually happened...
bug_report.attachment_help: Images and videos (max 50MB each, up to 5 files)
bug_report.error_submit_failed: Failed to submit report. Please try again.

validation.new_min_length: Password must be at least 6 characters
validation.same_as_current: New password must be different from current password

media_library.title: Media Library
media_library.description: Upload images and videos to use in public page editor components.
media_library.delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this file?
media_library.drag_drop: Drag and drop or click to select
media_library.formats_hint: Images: PNG, JPEG, SVG (max 5MB) • Videos: MP4 (max 20MB)

welcome.title: Welcome to Hub!
welcome.description: Welcome! This is your central hub to manage your organization.
welcome.intro: Hub is your central management portal. From here you can access all your applications, configure your organization settings, and manage your team.
welcome.ready_title: All set! You can start using it right away.
welcome.ready_description: Your system is 100% functional. The following settings are optional — use them to customize the system with your brand.
welcome.hint: You can skip this wizard at any time and configure these settings later.
welcome.feature2: Customize branding with your logo and colors
welcome.feature5: Browse and import templates from the Marketplace

branding.title: Customize Your Brand
branding.description: Configure your company's visual identity. This information will be displayed on public quotes, emails and reports sent to your clients.
branding.feature4: Media library for public page backgrounds

communication.title: Email Configuration
communication.description: Set up your SMTP server to send emails to clients. This allows you to send quotes and reports directly from the system.

marketplace.title: Template Marketplace
marketplace.description: Browse curated templates by medical specialty and import them to your TQ with one click. Start with ready-made templates and customize them to your needs.
marketplace.feature2: Landing page templates for public quotes
marketplace.feature3: Filter by specialty: General, Dentistry, Nutrition
marketplace.feature4: Preview before importing to your TQ

complete.title: You're All Set!
complete.description: Your Hub is ready to use. You can always access these settings from the Configurations menu in the sidebar.
complete.access_tq_description: On the home page, you'll see application cards at the top. Click on the TQ card to open the application.
complete.access_tq_feature1: Login is automatic — no need to enter credentials again
complete.access_tq_feature2: TQ opens in a new tab, ready to use
complete.support_description: Click the support icon in the top menu to contact us anytime.

resume.title: Continue Setup?
resume.description: Resume the setup assistant when ready.

marketplace.title: Template Marketplace
marketplace.subtitle: Browse curated templates by specialty and import them to your TQ
marketplace.preview_disclaimer: This is a generic preview. Import to see it with your brand's colors, logo and settings.
marketplace.lp_preview_note: Structural preview — the actual landing page will be fully rendered after import.
marketplace.empty_description: Try adjusting your filters or check back later for new templates.

mobile.desktop_only_description: This feature is available on tablet or computer
